Package mtas.search.spans

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MtasSpanAndQuery
    Search for hits from multiple MtasSpanQueries occurring at the same position
    MtasSpanContainingQuery
    Search for a hit from a MtasSpanQuery (big) containing the hit from another MtasSpanQuery (small)
    MtasSpanEndQuery
    Search for the end of a hit for the provided MtasSpanQuery.
    MtasSpanEndSpans
    Return just the end of hits.
